device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
scale: Near, personal space; Social space; Room
evaluation: User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment); User study (qualitative)
contribution_desc: This cross-device paper presents the design of visual feedback for increased awareness of transferred objects during cross-device data transfer (e.g., with Pick-and-Drop) between a tablet and a tabletop.
